name: Cropsweeper
description:
How to play:

Crops can be harvested and sold by left clicking. You can hold left click to harvest crops faster.

Some crops are infected, and the numbers on the soil show how many crops around it are infected. If there's no number, none of the crops around it are infected.

If you sell an infected crop, you get fined $8.

Crops can be sprayed by right clicking. Sprayed crops die.

Crops can be planted by holding shift and left clicking.

You can press 1, 2, 3, or 4 to switch the crop you're planting.

Everything else can be found by messing around and seeing how different crops interact.

Some crops have different effects when placed near each other.

This game was made for Ludum Dare 52. The theme was Harvest.
